description: Participant object that contains information about the participant.

user_id.description: Unique Participant Identifier. This is unique for each meeting participant and is valid only for that meeting.

id.description: User Id of the participant. Same as the User Id used in the [Users API](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/zoom-api/users/usercreate) if participant joined the meeting by logging in.

join_time.description: The time at which the participant joined the meeting.

leave_time.description: The time at which the participant left the meeting.
